title: AI & Machine Learning Basics
content:
Introduction

Artificial Intelligence is the simulation of human intelligence processes by machines.

  • Machine Learning: Subset of AI where computers learn from data without being explicitly programmed.
  • Supervised Learning: Learning with labeled data (e.g., Classification, Regression).
  • Unsupervised Learning: Learning with unlabeled data (e.g., Clustering).
  • Neural Networks: Computing systems inspired by the biological neural networks of animal brains.
